"The miracle of Mr Umbra!":
"Which rumour is it that did not
blow up... but then recently I keep hearing
about this rumour of meeting Mr Umbra!
Finally there is this chance to meet him, yeah!
In addition, there is this talk of a miracle
occurring once you meet Mr Umbra Therefore,
there is no choice but to go and meet him!
Please! Could you go there and meet him
and come back?
*Clear the E Trial [Gift from the Storm]"

"どのウワサも不発だったけど
最近、Mr.アンブラと遭遇したっていう
ウワサをよく聞くようになったよ！
ようやく会えるチャンスだね！
しかも、Mr.アンブラに遭遇すると
ミラクルが起きるって話なのっ！
これは見に行くしかないよね！
お願い！　行ってきてくれないかなっ？

※Eトライアル「嵐の贈り物」のクリア"
